verses.text:
There'll be no grief in heav-en's fair cit-y, no part-ing day;
There'll be no sor-row there, no weep-ing, no sor-row there.
Safe in the arms of Je-sus, safe from care and pain,
No sor-row there, no sor-row there.

There'll be no part-ing there in the glo-ry, no part-ing there;
There'll be no sor-row there, no weep-ing, no sor-row there.
Safe in the arms of Je-sus, safe from care and pain,
No sor-row there, no sor-row there.

And when our earth-ly pil-grim-age is o-ver, we'll meet them there;
There'll be no sor-row there, no weep-ing, no sor-row there.
Safe in the arms of Je-sus, safe from care and pain,
No sor-row there, no sor-row there.

chorus.text:
No sor-row there, no sor-row there,
In heav-en a-bove, no sor-row there;
No sor-row there, no sor-row there,
In heav-en a-bove, no sor-row there.
